<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Pillar of Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=1394)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Rage of Elements](/Sources.aspx?ID=205) pg. 174 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 77

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You create a large, self-contained cylinder of still, clear fresh water. You choose the radius and height of the pillar, to a maximum radius of 15 feet and a maximum height of 60 feet. Creatures inside the pillar can [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) through the water as normal ([Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) DC 10), or if the spell was cast on solid ground, walk along the bottom (which is [difficult terrain](/Rules.aspx?ID=453)). Any creature that exits the pillar falls or lands accordingly.
name: Pillar of Water
